targets.query:
from(bucket: "dust")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weatherstation")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature_c")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stationId"] == "${stationid}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "dust")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weatherstation")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rain_mm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stationId"] == "${stationid}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stationId"] == "${stationid}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "dust",
  tag: "stationId",
  predicate: (r) => true,
  start: -30d
)
list.label: Station ID
list.name: stationid
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "dust",
  tag: "stationId",
  predicate: (r) => true,
  start: -30d
)
